name: Chemosit
description: The Chemosit is a medium fiend with a crutch and an open mouth that emits a red light. It is characterized by its neutral evil alignment and has a single leg beneath its unusual form.
memorable: The Chemosit's enchanting Inviting Song can charm opponents, leading them toward it while avoiding dangers.
goals: To manipulate and charm foes using its song and prowess in battle.
relations: It might serve dark powers or align with other fiends.
environment: Can be found in dark, sinister places often associated with evil or fiendish activity.
strengths: High hit points, good saving throws, and resistance to multiple damage types with a versatile attack set.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to magical piercing, bludgeoning, and slashing damage from silvered weapons.
attacks: Employs a Beak attack dealing piercing and fire damage alongside two Crutch attacks that may infect with disease.
most_powerful_ability: Its Inviting Song can charm multiple creatures, manipulating their movement strategically in combat.
equipment: a crutch that adapts to fit its forms
senses: It possesses darkvision extending up to 120 feet and a passive Perception of 15, allowing it to be quite aware of its surroundings.
skills: It has a commendable skill in perception, assisting it in scenarios where awareness is key.
additional_information: Can change shape into Small or Medium humanoids.
One leg design makes its movement unusual.
Retains statistics regardless of its shape.
Darkvision allows it to see in total darkness.
